text: Joel David Moore (born September 25, 1977) is an American actor and director. He is known for his roles as Colin Fisher on the Fox series Bones and Dr. Norm Spellman in James Cameron's Avatar (2009) and its sequels Avatar: The Way of Water (2022) and Avatar 3 (2024). ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Portland, Oregon Category:Writers from Portland, Oregon Category:American movie directors Category:American screenwriters
title: Joel David Moore
